list.title: Backstage System Development Platform
description: Designed and built a unified YAML-configured no-code backend management platform with a drag-and-drop UI, enabling cross-functional teams to independently create admin dashboards. The platform utilized standardized templates for rapid system generation and included built-in authentication and role-based access control (RBAC).

Implemented MySQL with Blitz.js and Prisma for structured data management, integrated Entra for authentication, and customized proxy solutions to address verification signing, cross-domain access, and system monitoring needs.
